channel.title: Mod tharaok or a mod or global mod read this plz
channel.description:
on my server i need help theres this faggot excuse my language that is multi logging, autoeing, creating multiple account and way more stuff and i have a question,
HOW DO U IP BAN SOMEONE ON THE SERVER?[br][size=1]Posted on: January 06, 2007, 03:17:49 PM[/size][hr]I know this might be spam but i need the help or send me a personal message or tell me to send this question to u on pms
